values: I have it...and no, you can't borrow it. I have true love, the kind that people search their whole lives for, it's senational and it almost makes me lose my breath. He's beautiful, and funny, and caring, and he's completely crazy about me, which makes it the best and most true love i've ever had. Jake, was a complete flake and I hate him, really I do. Along with Brady Farner. I'm going to get married!!! I know it!!

so i replaced you with a real journal, but i found myself missing my online secret keeper. so here i am.

things are so amazing, i am in love, unboubtable in love. everything about peter JAKE STONE is incredible, he is everything I've ever wanted, if I were a male, i'd undoubtably be him, bottom line. He's my everything, it's scary to feel so strong after such a short time, but I love every second, I hope we're together for a long time, it would be amazing. wow. :) isn't he adorable, why yes. he is. and he's funny, and just great at everything.bottom line. he snowboards and he's active and he's just all that i've ever wanted. omg.  YAY. anyway,  that's all i've been doing, I'm with jake almost everynight, it's sensational.

i bid theee adu. or whatever the saying is :).

<3 Meg

if i could tell you anything 
i'd tell you to stay far away 
far from me and all the games i play 
games i dont choose 
but games that choose me 
i dont mean to hurt you 
it's not my intetenion 
it happens 
i wish it wouldn't 
but with you hurting 
i know i can't 
i know that i'm strong 
because i make you weak 
i push you away 
try to make you mad 
and i succeed 
i finally push you too far 
and you leave me
now i'm alone 
it proves  it wasn't meant to be

i thought i found him once
the one i was destinced for
he came into my life and
it hit me like a ton of bricks
it was pefect, the nights
i thought they could last forever
he was made for me
i knew it without a doubt
and then there she was
with her dirty blonde hair
that flowed like a matted mess
she was beautiful, i hated her
he left me, not once
but many times for her
she gave him something i couldn't
and she took away my most prized
possession.
he came back, and i let him back in
again, i was hurt, and torn
and even again i took him back,
he was my breath, my every energy
still now i can't cry, the pain is still there
but i have a funny way of staying numb
i miss him, sometimes it's excrusiating
i know however he wasn't the one
i feel i shall never have love again
i can't give what others give,
i feel as if i have nothing left to offer
only my torn heart survives
i want love, i really do
but somehow i don't believe in it any longer

i hate that song that makes me think of you
you know the one?
the one from the first night
the night you said you loved how my hair smelled
but you hated my pink toe-nail polish
you told me you knew you had loved me forever
just couldn't admit it until that night
and we both laughed, because it was incredibly cheesy
do you remember the one?

i hate that song that reminded me of the river
you know the time we went and skipped rocks
and sat on the railroad tracks with our feet dangling
remember? 
you laughed becuase i was scared
and then you kissed me

i hate that the song brings your taste back to my lips
your body was warm and great to cuddle up to
you were my cuddly teddy bear and you held me just right
remember?
on the way home you squeezed my hand
i was ready to tell you i loved you
but you beat me to it
i ran to my room and jumped on my bed, i was ecstatic

remember that song?
the one we danced to under the moonlight
where you spinned me around
and i sang in your ear
you said i had an amazing voice and i blushed

remember driving to the movies?
that song played faint in the background
the wind was in my hair as we drove in your red car
you looked at me and i looked at you
you winked and i laughed becuase i thought there was something
in your beautiful green eye
remember?

remember that one song?
you played it for me the night i came back
you told me that you knew i was the one
we sat in the sonic parking lot for two hours
talking and planning our future
the smell of tatertots smothering us
i turned away for you not to see my tears

remember that last song?
the one from the country road
that day you told me it was over
that the love was gone and she was what you wanted?
remember how you cried and i begged you no?
i was tough for 15 mins, and that damned song
it struck something inside and i cried
i cried for 2 days

i hate songs that make me think of you
because of all the bad and good times.

i dont know why i am like this tonight
low and down
but for some reason i'm numb
maybe it was the pills, i don't know
i just feel as if i'll cry
it could just be the cigarette smoke
i don't know for sure
i feel alone
like a lost child in walmart
i need someone to take my hard
show me where to go
what to do
my life is in a ditch and i have no rope
i can't climb out of this feeling
i wish i knew what to do
where my life should go
it seems as if everyone else knows what to do
where to go
everyone except me that is
i wish i had a compass
one that worked and was easy to read
to direct me in the right direction
but no
there is no compass to help me right now
they are all broken
today school started
i never thought i could miss it
but i do
i miss the drama and hot football players
who always ignored me
i need a job
something to occupy my wandering mind
but i haven't found one
i do believe i could smile again if i could 
just stop thinking.
damnit.
the smoke is in my eye again.

i miss brady, i miss him so much today. we talked about being back together, and things were great for a couple days, but I thought about it and i'm too scared to be with him right now, i dont want him to hurt me again, i couldn't take it again with him. i want something with him so bad, but now just can't be the time, i wish he could understand and just be my friend you know. i hate not having him here by my side. but it's his choice and i think he doesn't even want to try with me anymore, but i cna't be with him now, so if he feels that way then evidently it's not meant to be.

this weeks been a bit crazy, finally i'm all done with school, holy sweet hell it's scary saying that. i feel so depressed right now, i mean so incredibly low. i think a lot is because i'm leaving high school and i'm so scared for the real world. i went to see Kelli yesturay and i ended up being able to work with her, she told me to give her my cell into her cell (brady's old cell) and i was like i dont think he deleted it and i looked through, and there was a name called 'my baby' and i'm an idiot and thought maybe it was mine...but it was katy's number. that fucking sucks. and then i went to a party with brynn last night and brady and brian were there and they both started talkin shit when we got there and then they left like a bunch of fuckin 5 year olds. it was horrible. guys are fuckin lame, i'm never goin to fall in love again, and i'm never gonna fuckin try to either, all they do is hurt me.

why is it that every guy seems to be out to disappoint me? dang it i really liked zach, and once again i got screwed around with, he's so weird. he like never liked me i dont think, but damnit he was a good kisser. i'm not going to talk to him anymore, he can talk to me, it's not my choice it's his. i deleted his number and i deleted him off of my list. i wish i had someone right now though, so i didn't have to fucking think about brady. i dont know why but lately it's been fucking horrible, it's like everything makes me think of him! i think it's just because after sunday i wont hardly ever see him. i am going to miss him like crazy. i just wish he could be there for me like i want to be there for him. i'm so completely and utterly lonely, i hate it, i hate not having anyone. i hate thinking that no one is thinking about me at night, that no one likes me at all. I HATE IT. Friday night i guess Brynn + Me + Mom + Curt + Meemaw + Aunt Shea + Aunt Missy + Aunt B are all going to Graham's...it's so funny, it should be a lot of fun. i keep thinking about Kiki a lot lately. that sucks a little knowin that he hates me. oh well my life = shit a little.

ok so saturday school completely COMPLETELY sucks. I am all done with what needs to be done and i still have another damned hour left in here. i am going shopping today to get my graduation outfit. YAY. nothin makes me feel better than shopping. last night zach never called me, it sorta makes me mad, but i decided i'm not gonna just wait around on him ya know. so i called jeff and we hung out, he's a lot of fun, kind goofy, but a lot of fun. I don't like him as much as I like Zach, but then again, I haven't hung out with him as many times. I honestly don't care about the brady thing anymore, the only thing i miss is his mom, that killed me to see her the other day, i just miss her like crazy :(. she's so awesome and i wish i could see her more, we decided that one day after graduation me and her are gonna take off shopping. ahh i can't wait. 
i have monday, tuesday and 1 block on wednesday, and i'm outta here! it's so insane, it seems like just yesturday i was in 2nd grade in the principles office for calling the lunch lady a bitch because i couldn't have the milk i wanted. i was a horrible, horrible kid. lol. so on the agenda for this week:
on monday it's my last A day.
Tuesday i have b day finals
wednesday i have a day finals
wednesday night i have the senior camp out....dunno if i wanna go *uh huh* will be there *yikes*
thursday morning i have the senior breakfast
thursday morning i have to turn in my laptop and then i have to do graduation practice
thursday night i have the banquet.
Friday PARTY
Saturday Mom + Curt + Memaw + Shea + Missy + Aunt B are all coming! (well maybe Friday I don't effin know.)
Sunday *que the cheesy graduation song* GRADUATE. Holy effin HELL.
what what i'm almost a graduate!
hells yeah bitches
woohooooo

I LOVE YOU BLAKE! don't let anything hold you down, i know it's a tough time but you'll come out on top of this and you'll be 150% better off without him. you always have me and brynn here for you so just remember if you need to talk give us a ring! you're our best friend and we love ya to death.
So my love life is sort of lame right now. i really like Zach, but I dont know anymore...i really don't. there is Jeff too, and i like him, but I think he's just looking for ASS and i'm not too into casual sex with random guys. I graduate in such a short time! it's insane to think that i'll be completely done with all this fucking drama at this school. Me and brynn are gonna move out together, and maybe Blake will move out with us too :). I just can't wait! my mom comes down next weekend, i have to say i'm excited sort of. i'm nervous though too, i haven't seen her since October! She's bringing my favorite aunts with her though, that should be great.
I'm currently trying to find a new job. Gambino's make my hands smell HORRIBLE. I don't like my job, but we hired a new guy the other day. OH GOD I HOPE HE"S HOT.  HOLY SHIT I GOT SATURDAY SCHOOL FOR MY FIRST TIME EVER, for ditching on senior ditch day. Fucking LAME ASS. they think it's funny that i really got in trouble for the first time and it's the last weekend before i graduate. Tomorrow night i might be goin to this party with all these fn hot ass guys who play BASEBALL. YAYAYAYAYAY. well i'm out. have a great fucking day.

tonight i'm sort of blue i guess. i wanted to hang out with zach a lot today, i knew that he'd make me feel better, which i've been in a 'funk' the past 2 days, i just wanted to feel a lot better. i'm starting to think that i'm trying to invest too much into this thing, maybe i should chill out and not think about him as much. i pretty much think he's still in love with his ex girlfriend and that's horrible, she's married and pregnant but she still has something for him, and he still has something for her, i dont wanna get hurt again. and so i tried to put it on the line... to see how he felt and he said he has nothing for her, but it doesn't look that way. i just dont know.

tonight i'm having really horrible back spasms and it's driving me nuts. work was easy tonight, we were almost completely dead. brady is a complete asshole. i've decided to give back everything he ever gave me, i'm goin to even give him back his ring. because it's not worth enough money to pawn it off. today i imed with zach, but we didn't talk much, he's hard to talk to online, he's like all over the place when i ask questions and he gives completely random answers. he asked today if i wanted to talk to Heather, that just kinda blew me away. In a way i'm scared because i'm scared he could still have feelings for heather and that's what's happened with the last 2 relationships i've had. i really just don't want to get burned again. who knows maybe i'm just being lame about this all, but i guess i'm just worried to get hurt. but what happens will happen.

tonight my heart aches for Zach, I feel horrible for him, he called me tonight, and i knew something was up, he sounded like he had been sleeping but then he told me that his uncle passed away today and evidently he was close to him. It made me completely sad to hear how bummed out he was, i wished i could just hug him right now. he's so perfect in every way, i think that honestly he'd be the only guy i'd want to be with right now, just because i feel like i could honestly trust him with all my heart. is that crazy to feel so strong about one person so soon? like my friend kasey from wichita wanted to hang out saturday, and i made up this absolutely lame excuse not to hang out with him, because i want to hang with zach, even if there is a possibility that he can't hang out, i'd still like to only hang with him right now. i feel like i already have a boyfriend, but i dont mind at all. my parents were going to go out of town this weekend to texas and i thought it was gonna be awesome i thoughtm aybe zach could just come hang out here with me. but then tonight they decided that they woudln't go out of town, so maybe i can go to benton (if he's still up to it) tomorrow night. saturday night we also were planning to go on a double date (me + zach <3 and brynn + brett.) but i also don't know about that, i guess saturday is the viewing for him, that could be a really tough day. it's ok though, if we're not goin to hang out then i completely understand. i hope all is ok.
<3 Meg

Jesus I feel like i'm obsessed. i can't quit thinking about Zach, it feels like we've been together for a really long time, because i'm so comfortable with him, i feel like i honestly could tell him anything. i want to be with him a lot, just to see him, i think he's so sexy. Tonight at work this guy had on this cologne and he smelled just like Zach, it made me want to call him so bad. I wanted to just take my truck and drive to Benton to see his cute ass. I guess Friday night I'm goin to his house and we're gonna watch movies, I getta meet his parents... :). I really hope they like me. In 2 weeks i'm goin to a titty bar with Zach, omg it will be fn hilarious. He's so cool, brady wouldn't of ever takin me before and I just think it will be a shit load of fun. so zach told me tonight that he talked about me so much to jason today that jason told him to shut up 7 times because he didn't wanna talk about me anymore, isn't that so cute! i'm not the only one thinking about the other person a lot <3 <3 <3. Gosh this is the best feeling in the world, he makes me really happy.
<3

Holy Cow I like him so much, it's insane. I think about him a lot and I just want to see him, he's so great. We had a date last night, we went to see Amityville horror show and that was fun, we kept talking through the whole thing, he even held my hand as we were leaving, and he unlocked my door and opened it for me, it was very nice. Then we went to where my truck was and we sat there talking and talking, saying that we were gonna start hangin out a lot and that we wont kiss anyone else because i guess you could say we're 'talking'. it's so cute. it's great that he wants to be a fireman, i just think that's so cute. ahh i can't wait to see him again. i just want to be next to him, he has a nice body i love it, he's really good a cuddling and he doesn't move to fast? this is great, nothing beats liking someone...or having a crush.
<3 <3 <3

it's really fn cold in here today, i'm happy i brought a blanket <3

i can't wait to see zach <3

aww he called me tonight. :) it makes me forgive him for not coming to see me last night, it bummed me out. but he said he fell asleep so i believe him, he's so cute! ahh. he keeps asking me to hang out too, it's great, i think maybe he does like me now. which is kickass because i deffinatly like him. i think about him a lot... is that weird? i dont know why i feel this way so soon. maybe brady was right and he did 'sweep me off my feet' since i'm feeling like this. i wish he would of been at brett's last night, so i'd of gotten to see him. i think tomorrow he's comin to get me and we're gonna go see the Amittyville Horror Show. Ahh it will gimme a reason to hold onto him <3 <3 <3.  mmm he's so cuddly. ah ok i have to stop thinkin about him. i drank so much last night i had 99 bananas and then 5 beers. can you say hung over?? yes i am.

Tonight was so amazing, Zach couldn't be more great. I can't stop thinking about him, I wish I could rewind the night to when I first saw him tonight. he makes me laugh so much and he's really innocent sort of. we didn't watch either of the movies really, i decided that i wanted to drive my truck and so we squeezed in there. we cuddled a lot and he told me he loved my smile, that it's what he was first drawn to about me. i told him it was his dimples that drew me to him. i really like this kid. honestly i cried on my way there, for one it was sad that i left my brady chapter in the dust, but on the other hand i was really excited and i knew that i would have a good time, it was nice to not think about brady tonight. zach had my complete attention, i dont think i thought about Brady once. zach isn't the type of guy who would use people i dont think, he's generally boyfriend material, he's cute, he's funny, he's smart, he's sweet, he's cute... :). i dont know, i don't want a boyfriend right now, but in  the future he could deffinatly be a choice. oh and he lives in BENTON not Park CITY which is great, because it's a lot closer...meaning we will see each other a lot i hope. it was really cute, i was leaning on his shoulder and he was tickling my ear with his goatee and then he kissed me cheek, it was really innocent like, and then i turned towards him and pulled him in and we kissed. it was better than last time. he asked me if i liked him and i said naw....not a bit and he said he felt the same way, it was funny. i dotn know, maybe i'm just being giddy like a little school girl, but tonight was the best. i can't wait to see him tomorrow night. when i told him i kinda wanted him to stay at bretts because i needed a protecter he acted like he was all for it, it was really cute. oh and we made out for like a hour and you know what else was great...he didn't once go for my boobs.
he's only been with one girl, it's really sweet. i have to say i have a new crush and it's a big one :).
please dont rain tonight, i need to hang out with zach :(.

Ahh i'm happy tonight :). I finally talked to Zach again and we're for sure hanging out tomorrow. he really wants me to wear my circle football shirt, and i'm goin to, he's goin to wear his too, we'll be matching like we're a couple, it's insane. i asked him tonight where he was going to college and he told me butler, that he got a scholarship to go to bethany but he didn't want to becuase it's so far away and so expensive. i said maybe it's a good thing that you didn't go to salina for bethany because his car wouldn't be able to make it, and he said yeah it would suck, your truck couldn't make it either. it was so cute, and i said something about not liking him and he got really defensive asking me why, and i told him i was kidding, that of course i liked him. i'm really psyched for tomorrow, i am really excited to see him again, and i like to think he's excited to see me too. it's gonna be funny, we're taking my truck and listening to a ghetto little portable radio because my car radio doesn't work. i'm gonna bring some blankets and maybe there will be a little cuddling. ahh what a nice day.
tonight i prepped for my date, i shaved my legs and my arms, i waxed and i even gave me a pedicure. first dates are the best, i haven't been so nervous for a date in a long time...since i think brady and my first date goin to where else....the drive in.
i guess i had an 'i miss brady day' today, he looked so nice in his cowboy get up. i just wanted to grab onto him and never let him go, but it was pointless to want to be near him because he doesn't care at all now.  then today i went to see his mom whom i love to death, i miss her like crazy, and i didn't expect to see brady come in, i really was hoping that he wouldn't but he did, and then i missed hugging him even more, but i sucked it up. tonight i watched the girl next door and when it was the sex part i started to cry, it made me miss him because we have made love to this movie before. i'll be ok as soon as it's the weekend and i dont have to see him, then i wont think about him as much as i did before.
anyway, gotta get some beauty sleep before my big date tomorrow.
i'll update you asap.
goodnight.

Hey sorry I didn't update you the other night when I said I would, I was working so I didn't have time. Zach and I didn't get to hang out Sunday night, he doesn't have caller id and he lost my number, so he called me today from jason's phone. He told me he would call me tonight sometime and I'm excited. Yay.

i bought some chapstick that made me think of him and he thought it was cute, not strange, but nice that I wanted to be reminded of him. And then today I went to goodwill with brynn and I found a circle football shirt just like his and I got it... 99 cents what a steal. i told him about that too, and he wants me to wear it when we go out. he said he'd wear his too and we could be matching. I guess friday night we're goin to the drive in, I'm totally psyched to spend all that time with him, he's a blast. and then saturday night is prom night, i decided not to go so that night instead me + brynn + clinton are all going to hooters so that clinton will be able to get out, he doesn't know yet though, i
think brynn and I are going to kidnap him, he's going to have a lot of fun.

i have felt rather productive today, i cleaned my closet, cleaned all the trash out of my truck, washed all my laundry, straightened my hair... it's a lot more than i usually do. i think zach's voice made me get a rush of energy. <3. I really can't wait to see him again.
well thanks for listening to my blab.

So i have realized that there is totally life after brady.
i met the coolest guy ever, well i've known him for quite a while, but then last night we started talking a little and then making out a lot. and tonight he came back to the party where i was and he is so cute! we went into brett's house and watched city slickers, i only got to hang out with him for like 45 mins, and that sucks. but it's ok, he's coming over tomorrow, i think it will be fun.
brady called and bitched me out today, it just makes me realize that things did suck with us. i didn't even get excited when he called, i was like oh god, what does he want now. i mean  of course i miss him, but i dont think i'm in love wiht him anymore either, and it's ok. i'm having fun.
so back to zach. he's sooo soooo soo cute, he has really dark hair and eyes, he's as tall as me, he has a goatee and it's hot, he has the hugest cheek dimples i've ever seen, and he has a pretty nice body, he's not like fat or anything, but he's not boney either, he's just cuddley. and i love to cuddle with him.
out of all the guys last night, zach was the only one who didn't try any moves, he just stood there and talked with me, i felt horrible that i called him jason... he's so much better than jason, he's not the kinda guy who like uses people, i can tell, he's just the genuine sweet guy. i remember when he was talking with blake i thought he was so dang cute, but i knew he liked her, so i didn't ever try to get anything out of it. but now i want to hang out with him a lot, there is nothing better than a new crush.
did i mention he's a SUPER GOOD kisser, holy hell.
ahh i can't wait to hang out with him tomorrow, he can make me laugh soo much.
he graduated highschool at christmas time...yes he's smart and funny, who would of ever thunk it.
he was an exterminater and tonight he used the line on me 'have you ever had sex with a bug killer' and i thought i was gonna pee my pants, he made me laugh so much. ahh well he's comin over early tomorrow so i'll update you tomorrow night.
ahhh
love always/ dreaming about zach <3 <3 <3

fuckity fuck fuck i'm pissed. i dont want to see him with katy, i knew that would make me cry, and he fuckin did it, he fucking did it! i dont understand, i gave him all that i could, i tried to be the best there could be. but i wasn't enough, he didn't love me anymore. i dont understand. i wish i was gone, i wish i would of never moved back from utah, i'd rather be there than here right now. i'd rather be alone or dead than here right now. he doesn't love me, how can you really fall out of love with someone and then 2 days later talk to another girl. how can you do it! i dont understand. i would of given him anything!  and i did, i gave him my fucking heart and he shattered it. he fucking stomped on it with his cowboy boot. he left me here to feel the pain...again. i hate him, i hate him more than anything right now. i hate that i love him too, because i want to fucking move on, to fucking hurt him like he hurt me!. why can't he just HURT. WHY CAN'T HE FEEL WHAT I FEEL IN MY SELF. WHY CAN'T HE CRY AND LONG FOR ME THE WAY I LONG FOR HIM. FUCK HIM. I HATE HIM. i hate crying over him. i hate it so much, and i hate that he looks at me like nothing ever happened.
fuck everything.

here i am, sitting on the floor in my closet, i find it's the only place that i can think everything that i want to think and i can feel everything that i want. i haven't cried today. the numbness is passing, but the tears aren't flowing. the break up has set in already but i still wont cry. i am to mad to cry. he lied to me. he lied to me about so many things, and i can't believe i believed him for so long. he's a liar. he fooled around with katy, he didn't just give her a peck. he told me friday he was planning on proposing to me. can you believe it. i believed him, i thought he really was. and today i just wanted a simple 'why?' and he told me just because he's stupid. yes, he's very fucking stupid. no body with a heart does such a thing, no body who supposibly 'loved' you fucks you the night before they dump you. he didn't kiss me when i got out of his car either. he is turning into chase, trying to just fuck without commitment. well i dont need him, i decided that, there is more to me than him. i just have to prove it to myself. and i will. if we were to try to get back together there would be a shit load of changes that needed to be made. i hate him blaming everything on me. he did a lot of wrong too, even if he doesn't see it. oh well. i'm done, i'm done sulking. one of brady's friends called me last night, he asked me to hang out tonight, and i am. we talked on the phone for 2 hours last night. i told him brady will be mad if he knows we're hanging out and the guy said he didn't care, so ok. i'm game. i'm excited. i'm about to do my hair. 

today i got my heart checked out by a specialist and they said i'll be ok, i just have to go back in 2 years for another echocardiogram. wish me luck in 2 years.

i need to do my hair. tonight should be fun, anything to get me to stop thinking about how much i dislike him now.

until tomorrow, i bid thee a good night.

today i feel cold, i feel cold and hurt. i found out that brady asked Katy to prom last saturday, the day before we got back together, and she said yes. On sunday she went and bought a dress and everything, and sunday night him and i got back together, he called and told her that we were back together, i feel so bad for her. i really have no reason to dislike her, yes she's prettier than i am, but that happens all the time, so that's not a reason to be mad at her. she's getting pulled around by him just like i am. i can't believe he had the nerve to do that. god i love him so much, i hate that he has to be like this. unknown sources told me that brady didn't feel like he could be with me during college because he wouldn't get to party and that's all i want to do. UM NO! i wanted an alone date this weekend, just him and I...like old times, and HE wanted to party, he didn't even act like he knew me at the party. That hurts so bad. I just want to be with him, have things the way they used to be. I  hate that i love him so much...i do because he's never loved me as much as i have loved him, because if he had, he couldn't of ever done these things to me. i'm not looking forward to seeing him with Katy, that will hurt and it will just make me feel bad for her. i dont know if i'll ever be with him again, this is hurting too bad, and my heart feels like it's goin to explode. 

on the good side of things, i can't eat therefore i can't gain any weight, everytime i eat i puke, so i'll just stick to water for now. i'm goin to go though and try to not think about him.

fuck my life. and everything else.

he left me today. he told me he loved me but he wasn't IN love with me. it hurts. it hurts more than words could explian. he doesn't love me at all anymore. i am so broken right now. i was so sure i wanted to be with him, so so so sure, i wanted to be with him forever. i wanted to have his children one day. god this is horrible. i hated to see him cry it hurt me more than anything. i hated seeing him cry. i just wanted to hold him, i wanted him to hold me so bad. i cried more than i thought i could cry in front of brady. i hope that he'll come to his senses and realize we're supposed to be together.

until then i'll be numb.

last night during me break i called brady, i told him i just longed to hear his voice, i asked him to please come by my job so that i could see him. he told me no over and over and over. so i no longer had my hopes up. while i was doing my closing procedures at work I saw a car pull into the drive way, a red car. I looked out at the car and expected the people in it to come in and try to order pizza, however they never got out of their car, I figureded they were waiting on someone to give them a ride home so I payed no more attention. When I walked out of the door i looked at the car again and I instantly felt my heart flutter, i knew who it was, Brady. I gave a big smile and i got into the car, we sat and talked and then I asked him if he would be my boyfriend again, he said yes, if you don't mess up again. I was ecstatic.

we made up and we are back together, I am so thankful.

i never want to fukup again. i love him.

when brady called me earlier he asked me to come over to his house to talk to him and his mother. i did. it was better than i thought it would be. Kelli told me how she felt about the thing, about not wanting me to hurt her son, and she told me she would still love me even if brady and i aren't together. that made me feel better because I love her to death. We held each other and cried for about 5 mins and just let each other know we loved each other. Then brady and i were left alone to talk, I sat by him on the couch and i asked what do we do now, he told me he still wasnt' sure, he said a part of him wants to be with me, the other part doesn't know if it can take being hurt again. Then he held me while i cried and cried. we stood outside and hugged and then i told him if this was goin to be the last day i could be with him could i just kiss him again, it was the most moving kiss in my life, and i cried when our lips met, i cried and cried, then i just couldn't take it, i had to leave. i'm hopeful ya know that we'll be together, but then i'm so scared he wont be with me. he told me he would call me tonight. 

please God let us be together.

i talked to him this morning, i begged for him to come and talk to me for 30 minutes, i asked him to please let me try to make things better. he told me he didn't think he could go through this again and that he didn't know if he would talk to me. i dont understand how he said he needed the weekend to be alone and think about things yet hang out with katy, wouldn't that just confuse things more? i laid in bed and cried for an hour and then my dad came home, he was so pissed that i was crying. he started to ask me about all of mine and brady's break ups, he asked me whose fault was the first one and I told him mine, becuase I was at a party when that guy kissed me and brady dumped me, we got back together however the next day. He asked about the second break up and I told him that brady dumped me and started to hang out with Katy again, and then we got back together a week or so after. He asked about the third break up and I told him that Brady dumped me and started to hang out with Katy again, and he took her to prom last year. He asked about the fourth and I told him that it was my fault because I moved back to Utah (he dated Katy again until I moved back and then he left her for me). He asked about the 5th break up and I told him it was my fault, it was a month ago and we broke up for a day (yes he started to hang out with Katy again then too). Then he asked about this break up and I told him that it wasn't all my fault, becuase it truly wasn't, I didn't want to break up with Brady, I wanted a few days for myself to think, I wanted to think about what I wanted for my life. He told me he couldn't give me the time I wanted, becuase he didn't want to wait around on me. Brady was the first one this time to mention 'dating other people' and then he was the first one who said 'maybe we should just break up'. I never once used either of those phrases, yet i'm the bad guy yet again, all i asked for was some Megan time, some real just alone time to get my head together. But here i am giving him all the time in the world and he couldn't give me a day. Sometimes I wonder, is this real love? how can you love someone and if have a spat you're instantly rebounding that night? it hurts me to even think about hanging out with someone else. he says that he loves me so much and everything, but I don't think he's truly proved it with what he did over the week. 

i promised to him that I wouldn't let him see or hear about me being with other guys. however he is flaunting katy in front of me. I dont understand how one girl can have such a hold on him. i mean i would ask him just to hold my hand in front of her and he wouldn't, he told me he was worried about her feelings, i dont understand how her feelings getting hurt is so much worse than mine getting hurt...when i was his girlfriend. I dont understand why he didn't tell me that she had been calling him or messaging him on Ichat. i dont understand how he could act like he's never ever loved me like he did this weekend. i have given him everything. i have tried so hard to make him happy. this just goes back to the 'giving 50%' thing, and i truly feel that sometimes he doesn't give over 30%. I understand that sometimes you can be tired and now want to go out, but why act like you're ashamed for people to see us together. i've never been ashamed of him, ever, I was so proud to take him out and show everyone that we were happy and that i loved him. 

holy shit he just called.
i found out that brady took katy to brett's house tonight. that sucks really bad.

so i officially don't know what to think right now. i am praying and praying that we will be together. i miss him so much. last night when i got home from school i typed him a really long letter and i put a picture of us at the bottom of it, and then i went to walmart and i bought a stuffed cow toy ( i think subconsiously i was trying to tell him that i'm fine with a cowboy for my husband). then i went and picked out some fake flowers...yes they were hidious. then i found a card and it explained everything so closely. in the card i wrote that i would love him until the flowers i gave him died and then I wrote in parenthesis that the flowers wouldn't ever die...becuase they were fake. also for valentines day he got me a book of coupons and he told me that he would do anything that those coupons said. so i ripped out the forgive and forget coupon and i wrote in the card that he said he would honor those cards so i told him not to break him promise to me. i put those all in his car today while he was working, i just laid them on his seat and i left. the funny thing was that the card i got him for valentines day was laying on the dashboard, i found it odd, but maybe he was reading it while trying to figure out what i wanted.

i love him so fn much, i hope that my suprise touched his heart in someway.

i am having the worst night of my life, it's by far been the hardest night since the split. i havne't cried much i think i'm too numb to cry. i feel as if i'll never move on. i emailed him a really long email today, it was horrible, i feel like such a bitch. i dont know why i mailed it, but it said everything i felt. i told him it was my last attempt. now i'm leaving. to cry more. goodnight.

today couldn't of gone worse i dont think. I told myself over and over he'd be back with her, and guess who the hell he was walking with today *ding ding ding* yes, katy fucking long. and yesturday do you know what he asked me to do, he told me that he didn't want to know when i start talking with someone and that he didn't want to see it, and I told him that I didn't want to see him with Katy. but i sure as hell did. how could he be 'so in love with me' when he ONCE AGAIN goes off and rebounds the very next day. can he never just be alone?! EVER. honestly it's as if he's scared to not have a girlfriend. And the fact that he said 'fuck you' to me was really harsh, you dont tell people you love that. Thus making me come to the conclusions that 1. he was talking to katy behind my back, becuase she wouldn't just jump up and go chat with him from nothing. and 2. that he never truly did love me, even though he swore up and down he did. God I love him so much, but I can't deal with this, I can't deal with the fact that he believe i never appreciated him, I always thanked him for what he did. so guess who might be hanging out with another guy this weekend. Yes. Me. if he can move on that fast then why the hell can't i. it will hurt, i know it will, but i have to do it, i have to stop wondering whqat him and katy are doing. i doubt i'll even have fun. but i need to do it. wish me luck.

he wont be a real man, he's a quitter, you dont quit on people you love. ever. how could he say he loves me when he gives up because i ask him to stand behind me while i figure out my life, how could he walk away.; i love him so much. God i love him.

How can you love some body so much and then never ever give them a chance to make things right? I dont understand, all I know if that right now I feel the lowest that I ever have. I want the chance to talk to him, I want to tell him I do love him and that I can't picture myself wihtout him. I want him to understand why I need this change. I just wanted a break, not to be done forever. I wanted to stand on my own two feet, but just for a while, to prove to me that I could do it. I want him to wait on me, not for long, but long enough for me to decide what I want. I want him to want to still be with me, I want him to try. I want him to grab me in the hall and say that I have to be with him becuase he doesn't feel like he can go on without me. I hate having these feeling. I hate that he hates me now. I hate that he is ready to move on and i'm stuck here in the dust. I hate myself for letting him go. I hate not knowing anything anymore, not knowing what i'm going to do at all now. With Brady my life was planned out, but what if we woudln't of made it, then I would of been stuck with nothing, so basically I wanted a week to plan out my plan incase we were to fail. I would hope that we never would, but if so i wanted to prepare. I wish he could see that. I wish he could understand how much my heart aches for him right now.

God I'm a fuck up, and once again, I fucked up something that I had, something that was real.

do i deserve to have love? i question myself about many things but this i have no answer for. could anyone ever love me again, after the horrible things i have done? will anyone ever look at me the same way he does and tell me that they love my smile? what if i gave up the best thing in my life? what if i live to be an old lonely woman, who through away the only man who will ever love her? i'm not easy to love. i have very bad habits, such as biting my nails and over analyzing everything. what if he was the only guy who could look past that and just love me for me? i feel that i could deal with being a cowboys wife if it meant i'd have love all my life? how can i be sure though, i want a lifetime warranty. i know however i could never get enough money to purchase such a thing if it were possible. 

tonight i ache for his arms to hold me so bad. i long to kiss his gentle lips and look into those beautiful eyes, i miss his voice. and his hands, i wish he would hold me and let me cry right now, and tell him that i'm sorry, but this is what i need. i need to findout what life without him is like, only for a little bit, i need to stop using him as my 'lifeline' and start to stand on my own two feet, he's all i've known for the past two years. before him i had no love for men, i pretty much despised them due to being burned before, but he turned it around, he made me believe that i could be loved, not just used. he made me feel beautiful. i dont want it to be the end, but i feel that if he does move on quickly then it is, i'm not willing to move on yet. i just wanted some Megan time, to figure out what I want when I grow up, if i could put him and i on pause then i would, just to see what i want in life, what i generally need to be satisfied.

sometimes at night i feel like a black cloud floats above my head and i get depressed, i feel as if it's raining in my soul, no not raining pouring in my soul. it hurts. i put on a show to everyone that i'm happy, when i'm not. i'm low, lower than the earthworms in the damp dirt. i feel nauseous with who i have become compaired to who i was. i wish i could turn back time to the day i came into the world and make it right, make my life seem so less chaotic and horrible. i hate these confusing thoughts that run through my head. i wish i was alone, so that i could figure everything out, most days i wish i could be alone forever and never have to ever come back to this horrible world. some days i wish i didn't live because then i wouldn't feel so small and pathetic. i feel that i will never amount to anything, i think i will always be the girl that people will point at and say, 'Yes, she fucked up my life', because that's what i do, i hurt people and i wish i couldn't and wouldn't do it.

it's over, it's really over.  we tallked a lot last night and then this morning we did it again. we came to the conclusion together that we are too different to be together right now. it hurts, it really does, all night at work I though about what he was doing and how bad i wanted to call him and just see how his day was. i hurt when i thought he was out with Katy, which i'm sure he called her up, or msgd her online at school today, which sucks, but i mean it was bound to happen.  i really just want him to be happy and i felt like maybe i couldn't give him that anymore. i was happy, but i needed to know for myself that he was the right one for me. I know that i love him, there is no question in my heart, the only question that i have is that is he the one i'm supposed to be with forever? that's the only question. i guess if we are supposed to be together then we will, it's as simple as that, but as of right now, it really doesn't make this pain ease.

Ouch my tonsils... well the spot where I used to have tonsils. I hate this, i'm hurting so bad! I keep throwing up blood and I can't keep any liquids down, and it that keeps happeneing then i'll have to go stay the night in the hospital....not a good thing.

Brady has been more than wonderful, he came and seen me yesturday and stayed with me both times until I feel asleep, he would get me anything I wanted and he held me when I hurt. Today I puked and he rubbed my back and kept asking me how I felt, He sat in the bathroom while I showered and talked to me to make sure I was ok. He is so great and I dont know what i'd do without him. I never felt more taken care of in my life. I can see us being married and him taking care of me everytime I get sick, he would hold me every night until I felt better.

I guess I was allergic to some of the meds I was taking and that's what was makin me so sick, i was shaking uncontrollably. Luckily we found out what to do and what would make me feel better, otherwise i was gonna get a suppository, yes the thing up your bum, and that wasn't a good thing.

Anyway, the meds are kickin in and i'm tired, if i get more energy i'll be sure to write.
